mapper.sql: id, name, classify, address, province, city, district, remark, create_time, last_updated_time, status
mapper.insert: insert into drug_store ( name, classify, address, province, city, district, remark, create_time, last_updated_time, status ) values ( #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, address, classify, ST_Distance_Sphere (Point (#{lon}, #{lat}), geom ) AS distanceInMeters FROM drug_store WHERE ST_Contains ( ST_MakeEnvelope ( Point (( #{lon} + ( #{distance} / 111.12 )), ( #{lat} + ( #{distance} / 111.12 ))), Point (( #{lon} - ( #{distance} / 111.12 )), ( #{lat} - ( #{distance} / 111.12 ))) ), geom ) ORDER BY distanceInMeters ASC
